channel.title: United pkz 317 v1[pi]
channel.description:
[center]
Hello everyone this is my first 317 Source that i have released onto moparscape, enjoy :).great base holded 56 players on 1gb vps from vpsland,didnt get much donations so pretty much decided to close it down to make a long story short.
download client-[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?6dllhwl1b2lx18q]http://www.mediafire.com/?6dllhwl1b2lx18q[/url]
download source-[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?18wg41if3sm8o1a]http://www.mediafire.com/?18wg41if3sm8o1a[/url] ~~Features~~ ~Working d claw spec 100% ~working pest control ~Rewards point system ~moved home to custum ~moved all shops to custum ~added theiving stalls at home ~added prayer altar lunar altar and ancients altar at home ~you now do ::slayer to get to slayer tower and do ::gwd to get to godwars ~All gwd bosses ~staff of light ~(i) rings ~imbued~ ~rock crabs training (1500 exp per hit -- go to "Config" to change the exp rate per hit ~lots of commands ~working fight pits mini ~Castle wars is 30% you can fix the rest ~working veng :D ~working clan chat ~Barrows mini works 100% - just like real rs ~Pretty good switching and no bank glitches ~chaotics ~turmoil - 100% --Shitty pi emote though :( ~All pvp armours and weapons ~Staking works at ::duelarena
pictures
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/united1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/united2-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i845.photobucket.com/albums/ab17/coolguyvictor/united3.png[/img]
credits-
sanity-50% exion-20% coder eddie(me)-30% [/center]

item.title: United pkz 317 v1[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Xx Weed Xx, post:8, topic:416981”]Barrows mini-game isn’t 100% on this.

It doesn’t have every PVP item.

What’s the point in adding stupid commands like “::slayer” honestly just use the spell book to teleport.

Turmoil isn’t 100%.

Moving objects & NPC’s isn’t hard.

Overall a bad release because almost every server out there has the other features listed above.[/quote]As a lover of the older PI’s as well I agree with what Dan has stated here.

p.s. if turnoil is blue instead of white on the animation then it really isn’t 100% now is it?

Read full topic

item.title: United pkz 317 v1[pi]
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Eddie Coder Eddie
item.description:
@Coder_Eddie wrote:

[center]

Hello everyone this is my first 317 Source that i have released onto moparscape, enjoy :).great base holded 56 players on 1gb vps from vpsland,didnt get much donations so pretty much decided to close it down to make a long story short.

download client-http://www.mediafire.com/?6dllhwl1b2lx18q

download source-http://www.mediafire.com/?18wg41if3sm8o1a
Features
~Working d claw spec 100%
~working pest control
~Rewards point system
~moved home to custum
~moved all shops to custum
~added theiving stalls at home
~added prayer altar lunar altar and ancients altar at home
~you now do ::slayer to get to slayer tower and do ::gwd to get to godwars
~All gwd bosses
~staff of light
~(i) rings ~imbued~
~rock crabs training (1500 exp per hit – go to “Config” to change the exp rate per hit
~lots of commands
~working fight pits mini
~Castle wars is 30% you can fix the rest
~working veng
~working clan chat
~Barrows mini works 100% - just like real rs
~Pretty good switching and no bank glitches
~chaotics
~turmoil - 100% --Shitty pi emote though
~All pvp armours and weapons
~Staking works at ::duelarena

pictures

credits-

sanity-50%
exion-20%
coder eddie(me)-30%
[/center]

Read full topic
